description:
The holidays have arrived, and lust is in the air! Kosuda and Yamada are ready to get busy on a special Christmas Eve date, but the park is full of perverts!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Romantic Christmas Eve! What Does the First Kiss Taste Like? - I Can`t Go Back Empty-Handed! Let`s Go to the Make-Out Park!
Tokimeku Seiya First Kiss-tte, Nan no Aji? / Kono Mama ja Kaerenai! Icha Love Kouen ni Ikou yo!
Un`Eccitante Vigilia di Natale Com`è il sapore del primo bacio? - Non posso tornare a casa così! Andiamo al parco degli innamorati!
ときめく聖夜 ファーストキスって, なんの味? / このままじゃ帰れない! いちゃラブ公園に行こうよ!
